answers.answer: May I ask what you're eating?  Are you overweight?  Sometimes if you eat sweets it can cause blood sugar issues that may be indicitive of diabetes.  I would recommend that you see your doctor and keep a journal of what you're eating and maybe you will see a pattern as to what foods are causing the dizziness.

question: i get dizzy approximately 20-25 minutes after eating.  this just started 2 weeks or so ago, and happens about 50% of the time.any guesses???
title: dizziness after eating
